mapper.select: SELECT p.payment_id, p.reservation_id, u.nickname AS userNickname, z.zone_name AS campground_name, u.phone AS userPhone, r.reservation_site AS reservationSite, r.checkin_time AS checkinTime, r.checkout_time AS checkoutTime, r.reservation_status AS reservationStatus, r.refund_status, r.cancel_reason AS cancelReason, r.requested_at, r.refunded_at, p.payment_method, p.payment_status, p.payment_price, p.refund_amount, p.fee_amount, r.refund_type, p.paid_at AS paid_at FROM payments p JOIN reservations r ON p.reservation_id = r.reservation_id JOIN users u ON r.provider_code = u.provider_code AND r.provider_user_id = u.provider_user_id JOIN campground_sites s ON r.reservation_site = s.site_id JOIN campground_zones z ON s.zone_id = z.zone_id WHERE p.payment_id = #{paymentId}
